H0.text: What is the Greek and Turkish delicacy of spiced rice and meat wrapped in vine leaves. Yaprakia

H1.text: What is the Greek and Turkish delicacy of spiced rice and meat wrapped in vine leaves. Sarma

H2.text: What is the Greek and Turkish delicacy of spiced rice and meat wrapped in vine leaves. Koupepia

H3.text: What is the Greek and Turkish delicacy of spiced rice and meat wrapped in vine leaves. Dolma

A4.text: The origins of stuffed vine leaves, or sarma, are unknown.

A5.text: The word dolma, of Turkish origin, means 'something stuffed' or 'filled'.
